languages.text: "Осторожнее с ним, молодой брат. Да, он безумен и уродлив, но еще могуч, стар и благословлен нечистым покровительством Архиврага. Его исполненные злобы проповеди состоят из малефиций, а его оружие отняли жизни у сотен солдат при планетарном штурме. Хоть и тяжкие раны ему нанесли, враг сей еще себя покажет".

"Tread lightly when facing him, young brother. Yes, the beast is mad and hideous, but he is withal mighty, old, and graced with the Archenemy's profane patronage. His hateful sermons abound with malefictions, and his weapon claimed the lives of hundreds during the assault. We grievously wounded him, true, but we haven't seen the last of this foe."
languages.original_text: "Осторожнее с ним, молодой брат. Да, он безумен и уродлив, но еще могуч, стар и благословлен нечистым покровительством Архиврага. Его исполненные злобы проповеди состоят из малефиций, а его оружие отняли жизни у сотен солдат при планетарном штурме. Хоть и тяжкие раны ему нанесли, враг сей еще себя покажет".

languages.text: “面对他的时候务必当心，年轻的兄弟。没错，这头野兽虽然发了疯，但他非常强大，还得到了混沌大敌的亵渎庇护。他的布道充满了憎恨与恶毒，他的武器已经夺走了数百名战士的生命。我们确实重创了他，但我们并没有亲眼看到他断气。”
languages.original_text: "Tread lightly when facing him, young brother. Yes, the beast is mad and hideous, but he is withal mighty, old, and graced with the Archenemy's profane patronage. His hateful sermons abound with malefictions, and his weapon claimed the lives of hundreds during the assault. We grievously wounded him, true, but we haven't seen the last of this foe."

traits.locale_text: “面对他的时候务必当心，年轻的兄弟。没错，这头野兽虽然发了疯，但他非常强大，还得到了混沌大敌的亵渎庇护。他的布道充满了憎恨与恶毒，他的武器已经夺走了数百名战士的生命。我们确实重创了他，但我们并没有亲眼看到他断气。”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: « Méfie-toi si tu l'affrontes, jeune frère. Oui, ce monstre est fou et hideux, mais il est aussi puissant et aguerri, et il bénéficie de la protection impie du Grand Ennemi. Ses sermons haineux regorgent de malveillance et son arme a fait des centaines de victimes au cours de l'assaut. Nous l'avons gravement blessé, certes, mais il n'a pas dit son dernier mot. »
languages.original_text: "Tread lightly when facing him, young brother. Yes, the beast is mad and hideous, but he is withal mighty, old, and graced with the Archenemy's profane patronage. His hateful sermons abound with malefictions, and his weapon claimed the lives of hundreds during the assault. We grievously wounded him, true, but we haven't seen the last of this foe."

traits.locale_text: « Méfie-toi si tu l'affrontes, jeune frère. Oui, ce monstre est fou et hideux, mais il est aussi puissant et aguerri, et il bénéficie de la protection impie du Grand Ennemi. Ses sermons haineux regorgent de malveillance et son arme a fait des centaines de victimes au cours de l'assaut. Nous l'avons gravement blessé, certes, mais il n'a pas dit son dernier mot. »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: 「奴と対峙する時は慎重になれ、若き同胞。確かにあいつは気狂いで醜悪だが、強大で経験豊富なうえに渾沌の勢力の不敬な庇護を受けている。奴の憎悪に満ちた説教には悪意が満ち溢れ、奴の武器は襲撃の際に何百人もの命を奪った。我々は奴に重傷を負わせたが、始末したわけではない」
languages.original_text: "Tread lightly when facing him, young brother. Yes, the beast is mad and hideous, but he is withal mighty, old, and graced with the Archenemy's profane patronage. His hateful sermons abound with malefictions, and his weapon claimed the lives of hundreds during the assault. We grievously wounded him, true, but we haven't seen the last of this foe."

traits.locale_text: 「奴と対峙する時は慎重になれ、若き同胞。確かにあいつは気狂いで醜悪だが、強大で経験豊富なうえに渾沌の勢力の不敬な庇護を受けている。奴の憎悪に満ちた説教には悪意が満ち溢れ、奴の武器は襲撃の際に何百人もの命を奪った。我々は奴に重傷を負わせたが、始末したわけではない」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: «Ve con cuidado al enfrentarte a él, joven hermano. Sí, es una bestia demente y espantosa, pero es un ser extremadamente poderoso, viejo y goza del blasfemo favor del Archienemigo. Sus aborrecibles sermones están llenos de maleficios y su arma se cobró cientos de vidas durante el asalto. Hemos logrado herirle gravemente, pero eso no significa que vaya a ser la última vez que lo vemos».
languages.original_text: "Tread lightly when facing him, young brother. Yes, the beast is mad and hideous, but he is withal mighty, old, and graced with the Archenemy's profane patronage. His hateful sermons abound with malefictions, and his weapon claimed the lives of hundreds during the assault. We grievously wounded him, true, but we haven't seen the last of this foe."

traits.locale_text: «Ve con cuidado al enfrentarte a él, joven hermano. Sí, es una bestia demente y espantosa, pero es un ser extremadamente poderoso, viejo y goza del blasfemo favor del Archienemigo. Sus aborrecibles sermones están llenos de maleficios y su arma se cobró cientos de vidas durante el asalto. Hemos logrado herirle gravemente, pero eso no significa que vaya a ser la última vez que lo vemos».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Seid auf der Hut, wenn Ihr ihm gegenüber tretet, junger Bruder. Ja, die Bestie ist wahnsinnig und hässlich, doch er ist auch mächtig, alt und genießt den unheiligen Schutz des Erzfeinds. Seine hasserfüllten Predigten sind voller Verwünschungen, und seine Waffe hat während des Angriffs hunderte von Leben gefordert. Wir haben ihn schwer verwundet, ja, doch wir werden diesen Feind wiedersehen."
languages.original_text: "Tread lightly when facing him, young brother. Yes, the beast is mad and hideous, but he is withal mighty, old, and graced with the Archenemy's profane patronage. His hateful sermons abound with malefictions, and his weapon claimed the lives of hundreds during the assault. We grievously wounded him, true, but we haven't seen the last of this foe."

traits.locale_text: "Seid auf der Hut, wenn Ihr ihm gegenüber tretet, junger Bruder. Ja, die Bestie ist wahnsinnig und hässlich, doch er ist auch mächtig, alt und genießt den unheiligen Schutz des Erzfeinds. Wir haben ihn schwer verwundet, ja, doch wir werden diesen Feind wiedersehen."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Ona karşı tedbiri elden bırakma genç kardeşim. Yaratık, çılgın ve gudubet olabilir ancak bir o kadar da kudretli, kadim ve Şerbaşı'nın kâfirce himayesinde. Nefret dolu vaazları, hakaretlerden geçilmez. Silahı, taarruz esnasında yüzlerce can aldı. Menfur yaratığı ağır yaraladığımız doğru ancak bu, bu düşmanı son görüşümüz olmayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Tread lightly when facing him, young brother. Yes, the beast is mad and hideous, but he is withal mighty, old, and graced with the Archenemy's profane patronage. His hateful sermons abound with malefictions, and his weapon claimed the lives of hundreds during the assault. We grievously wounded him, true, but we haven't seen the last of this foe."
